name: cagents-marketplace
description: cAgents plugin marketplace - Universal multi-domain agent system

plugins.name: cagents
plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code with 229 specialized agents across 11 domains. V6.5.0 NEW: Context Management + Task Consolidation - replaces time estimates with token budgets, splits large tasks across multiple agents for 40-88% context reduction, 3-20x parallel speedup. Enhanced Reviewer V2.0: intelligent agent selection (33% faster), auto-fix suggestions (98% more actionable), pattern learning. V2 Universal Workflow Architecture with 5 universal workflow agents + task-consolidator working across all domains via YAML configuration. 10 core infrastructure agents + 219 domain experts. Features: massive parallel execution (up to 50 agents), recursive workflows, configuration-driven behavior, 4 execution modes (Sequential, Pipeline, Swarm, Mesh). Domains: software (45), business (18), creative (18), planning (17), sales (18), marketing (22), finance (17), operations (15), hr (19), legal (14), support (18). Universal /trigger, /designer, /reviewer, /optimize commands.
